mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SM_product_image (id, image_type, product_id, file_id) VALUES (#{imageId}, #{imageType}, #{productId}, #{fileId})
mapper.select: SELECT image.id AS imageId, image.image_type AS imageType, image.product_id AS productId, fileInfo.file_name AS fileId FROM sm_product_image image, sm_product product, sm_file_info fileInfo WHERE image.product_id = product.product_id AND image.file_id = fileInfo.file_id AND product.product_id = #{value}
